scene.name: intro-first-conversation
scene.line: Truck sounds like it's running kinda rough, there! Better keep an eye on it.
scene.option: We're all running a little rough, these days.
We had a little engine trouble, but it's sorted out now.

scene.name: shannon-sorted
scene.line: Glad to hear it. Electrical problem?
Not really sure, actually. Our new friends here helped us get it running again.

scene.name: conway-rough
scene.line: Well, that's you and me, anyway ... closer to the finish than the start. Seems it gets a little bumpier as you go. Ha!

scene.name: ezra-why
scene.line: You can't help where you end up, kid. You just end up there.

scene.name: junebug-repair
scene.line: `(To CONWAY.)` I think you left the radio on.
This is the real thing. Live.
Well, damn! You sound just like you do on the radio. I've got one of your tapes I picked up at a truck stop ... somewhere in the back there.

scene.name: joseph-root
scene.option: We met a friend of yours, named Lula.
Do you have any games on your computer?
I hear there's going to be a show in the morning.

scene.name: lula
scene.line: Oh, uh ... Yeah, I should have guessed you would.
Did she say anything about me?
scene.option: She said you used to be lovers.

scene.name: lula-long-time-ago
scene.line: Oh. Well. I guess that was a long time ago.

scene.name: zero
scene.line: I figured. Well, listen, I wish you luck. But I don't really want to talk any more about that. Bad memories.
Glad to hear you're on your way, though.

scene.name: games
scene.line: Hey, you know what, I might! My niece works nights at the hospital, and she swung by for her lunch break an hour or two ago. She's kind of a ... she doesn't talk a whole lot. But I like her company.
I heard her typing away in there. You might take a look!

scene.name: show
scene.line: So there is. I'll have to put on some more coffee.
